mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( id, name, password, del_yn, mobile, email, created_id, created_date, modified_id, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{user.id}, #{user.name}, #{user.password}, 'N', #{user.mobile}, #{user.email}, '10000000', NOW(), '10000000', NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT u.id id, u.name name, u.photo photo, u.mobile mobile, u.email email, t.name teamName FROM tb_user u, ( SELECT tb_team.name FROM tb_team, tb_team_user WHERE tb_team_user.user_id = #{id} AND tb_team.id = tb_team_user.team_id ) t WHERE u.id = #{id};
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user u SET u.name = #{user.name}, u.password = #{user.password}, u.mobile = #{user.mobile}, u.email = #{user.email}, u.photo = #{user.photo}, u.modified_date = NOW() WHERE u.id = #{user.id}
